Room.Name: Giant Tree Stump
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the north side of a giant tree stump in the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: The tree that once stood here must have been a world-wonder, if the girth of the stump is any indication. Looking up, you see the top of the tree trunk is considerably over your head, but there may be a way to climb up there. The path splits and goes around the tree in two different directions, and also leads away to the north. A short distance that way there is a heavy rope bridge cabled across a shallow gorge. The Ashton creek follows the gorge.
